statistics.idleTimeInfo: 长时间不操作（比如全屏观看视频），浏览器会自动进入休眠状态
statistics.localFilesInfo: 支持 PDF、图片、txt 以及 json 等格式

statistics.idleTimeInfo: 長時間不操作，比如全屏觀看視頻，瀏覽器會自動進入休眠狀態
statistics.localFilesInfo: 支持 PDF、圖片、txt 以及 json 等格式

popup.title: Popup Page
popup.defaultMergeDomain: {input} Whether to merge subdomains on open
popup.displaySiteName: {input}  Whether to display {siteName} instead of URL

locale.changeConfirm: The language has been changed successfully, please reload this page!

printInConsole.label: {input}  Whether to print {info} in the {console}

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.idleTimeInfo: If you do not operate for a long time (such as watching a video in full screen), the browser will automatically enter the idle state
statistics.countLocalFiles: {input}  Whether to count the time to {localFileTime} {info} in the browser
statistics.localFilesInfo: Supports files of types such as PDF, image, txt and json
statistics.collectSiteName: {input}  Whether to automatically collect {siteName} {siteNameUsage} when visiting the site homepage
statistics.siteNameUsage: The data is only stored locally and will be displayed instead of the URL to increase the recognition.Of course, you can also customize the name of each site.

filter.label: The background style of the modal page {input}

level.label: How to unlock while restricted {input}
level.nothing: Allow direct unlocking on the admin page
level.verification: Must enter verification code to unlock

gist.authInfo: One token with at least gist permission is required

obsidian_local_rest_api.endpointInfo: Only HTTP is avaiable because it is not possible to configure CORS for extensions's pages

download.confirmTip: {size} pieces of data from [{clientName}] will be downloaded

statistics.title: 統計
statistics.countWhenIdle: {input}  {idleTime} をカウントするかどうか {info}
statistics.idleTimeInfo: 長時間操作しない場合（フルスクリーンでビデオを見るなど）、ブラウザは自動的にアイドル状態になります
statistics.countLocalFiles: {input}  ブラウザで {localFileTime} {info} に費やされた時間をカウントするかどうか
statistics.localFileTime: ローカルファイルの読み取り
statistics.collectSiteName: {input} サイトのホームページにアクセスしたときに {siteName} {siteNameUsage} を自動的に収集するかどうか
statistics.siteNameUsage: データはローカルにのみ存在し、認識を高めるためにホストの代わりに表示に使用されます。もちろん、各Webサイトの名前をカスタマイズできます。
